full_summary:
#Pintle Trailer Supply Request

##Project Details
###Tender Title
- **English:** Pintle Trailer
- **French:** Remorque à anneau d’attelage

###Reference Information
- **Reference Number:** CB-864-34534394
- **Amendment Number:** 3
- **Solicitation Number:** W8476-246826/A

###Publication Information
- **Publication Date:** December 22, 2023
- **Tender Closing Date:** February 16, 2024, at 2:00 PM
- **Amendment Date:** February 8, 2024

###Contract Details
- **Expected Contract Start Date:** N/A
- **Expected Contract End Date:** N/A
- **Contract Status:** Cancelled

###Tender Details
- **Tender Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP) against Supply Arrangement
- **Trade Agreements:** Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement, Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA), Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA), World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA), Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement, Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA), Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA), Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA), Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA), Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
- **Procurement Category:** Goods and Services (GD)
- **Procurement Method:** Competitive – Selective Tendering
- **Selection Criteria:** Lowest Price

###Contact Information
- **Name:** Dong Le
- **Email:** [dong.le@forces.gc.ca](mailto:dong.le@forces.gc.ca)
- **Phone:** (999) 999-9999

###Tender Description
An amendment has been made to extend the solicitation closing date from February 8, 2024, to February 16, 2024. The Department of National Defence seeks to acquire five (5) Pintle Trailers and related items, with a delivery date of 180 days after receipt of the order. Suppliers must hold a Supply Arrangement (SA) under Request for Supply Arrangement (RFSA) E60HP-17TRLR. Documents may be submitted in either official language of Canada.

I reformatted the text to make it more concise, clean, and easy to read. I
